snippet.title: Starship Troopers: Extermination - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Starship Troopers: Extermination is a 16-player co-op first-person shooter set in the universe of the highly popular sci-fi franchise: Starship Troopers. Join the Deep Space Vanguard, an elite Special Forces branch of the Mobile Infantry, and report to your new commander, General Johnny Rico, voiced by Starship Troopers star Casper Van Dien! 

Squad up, grab your rifle, and do your part to take back the galaxy from the Arachnid threat!

Coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC on October 11. 
🎮 https://bit.ly/STExtermination

Early Access on #Steam NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1268750/Starship_Troopers_Extermination/

WISHLIST NOW! #STE #StarshipTroopers #FPS 

----
WOULD YOU LIKE TO KNOW MORE?

Join our Discord! https://discord.gg/starshiptroopersgame
Stay up to date with news from the Federation: https://x.com/TroopersExt
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/starshiptroopersext/
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/StarshipTroopersExtermination
